# UI/UX Redesign - Quick Reference

**Feature**: 011-ui-redesign
**Status**: Draft
**Type**: Frontend-Only (No Backend Changes)

## Design Vision

**Style**: Glassmorphism/Modern (blur effects, gradients, soft shadows)
**Colors**: Deep Rich Dark (navy/charcoal + gold/neon accents)
**Reference**: Linear.app
**Brand Voice**: Bold & Creative

## Key Components to Create

| Component | Purpose | Est. Time |
|-----------|---------|-----------|
| `GlassCard` | Glassmorphism card base | 2h |
| `FloatingDock` | macOS-style floating nav | 3h |
| `ThemeToggle` | Light/dark theme switch | 1h |
| `MultiStepForm` | Card-based multi-step forms | 4h |
| `TaskGrid` | Grid container for task cards | 4h |
| `TaskBoardCard` | Square board-style task card | 4h |
| `ChatSidebar` | Persistent collapsible chat | 4h |
| `Illustration` | Empty state illustrations | 3h |

## Quick Start

1. **Read the spec**: `spec.md` - Complete requirements and user stories
2. **Review the plan**: `plan.md` - Architecture and component design
3. **Check the tasks**: `tasks.md` - 35 atomic tasks, ~80 hours total
4. **Start with Phase 1**: Foundation (theme system, base components)
